name: Planet Zoom
description:
Aim of the Game:

The aim of the game is to gather as many points as possible whilst also avoiding all obstacles.

As the game progresses and with the points that your add to you high score, you will unlock additional lives and vehicles.

There are two game modes:
A grounded game mode where you are on a planet, collecting stars and avoiding obstacles and meteorites.

A space game mode acting as a bonus level, where no lives are lost if you lose. During this level you fly a space ship travelling toward a warp gate through an asteroid field. The stars that are collected on the way reward double points, however if the level is lost these points are removed.

Controls:

The game can be played either by mouse or keyboard through the WASD/Arrow keys and to Q to pause. In order to move the vehicle, simply drag the mouse into the direction you wish to go.
